trans-unit.source: Defines a workflow communication activity that is used to handle an event that is raised by a local service.
trans-unit.target: Define uma atividade de comunicação de fluxo de trabalho que é utilizada para processar um evento que é gerado por um serviço local.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A local service is a class that implements a local service interface (an interface that is marked with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>) and is added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Serviço local é uma classe que implementa uma interface de serviço local (uma interface que está marcada com <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>) e é adicionada ao <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The HandleExternalEventActivity receives data when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService> service raises an event with event data derived from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O HandleExternalEventActivity recebe dados quando o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>serviço desencadeia um evento com dados de evento derivados <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>

trans-unit.source: The HandleExternalEventActivity is a blocking activity.
trans-unit.target: O HandleExternalEventActivity é uma atividade de bloqueio.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from HandleExternalEventActivity should not implement the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener%601> interface because the derived class does not execute correctly.
trans-unit.target: As classes que derivem de HandleExternalEventActivity não devem implementar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener%601>interface porque a classe derivada não é executado corretamente.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener%601>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"> </xref> classe com o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo utilizador da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the handling of the event.
trans-unit.target: Cancela o processamento do evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> that represents the execution environment of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> que representa o ambiente de execução do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"></xref> at the end of the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"> </xref> no final da operação pedida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o enlace um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to correlate an event to the correct <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity"></xref>-inherited activity based on the payload of the event.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada para correlacionar um evento correto <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity"> </xref>-herdadas atividade com base no payload do evento.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a single workflow instance is listening for multiple instances of the same event at the same time, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_CorrelationToken" name="CorrelationToken" href=""></xref> property is used to route the event to the proper activity in that workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando uma instância de fluxo de trabalho único está à escuta para o mesmo evento várias instâncias ao mesmo tempo, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_CorrelationToken" name="CorrelationToken" href=""> </xref> propriedade é utilizada para encaminhar o evento para a atividade adequada nessa instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This correlation should not be confused with correlating an event to the correct workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Este correlação não deve ser confundida com correlacionar um evento para a instância de fluxo de trabalho correto.

trans-unit.source: The correlation to the correct workflow instance is done by sending the event to an explicit workflow instance and using the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs.InstanceId*> property to properly identify the correct workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: A correlação para a instância de fluxo de trabalho correto é feita ao enviar o evento para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho explícito e utilizar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs.InstanceId*>propriedade para identificar corretamente a instância de fluxo de trabalho correto.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs.InstanceId*>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crexample](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] correlation, see the [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crexample](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]correlação, consulte o [correlacionado exemplo de Serviço Local](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.CorrelationToken*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que visa a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.CorrelationToken*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.CorrelationToken*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the raised event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do evento gerado.

trans-unit.source: This property must be set before local communication can occur.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade tem de ser definida antes de comunicação local pode ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: The name of the raised event.
trans-unit.target: O nome do evento gerado.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the name of an event that is defined in an interface that was marked with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde ao nome de um evento que está definido numa interface que foi marcada com o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Tries to run the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tenta executar o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"></xref> at the end of the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"> </xref> no final da operação pedida.

trans-unit.source: Called when an exception is raised within the context of the execution of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a uma exceção no contexto de execução desta instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that caused this fault.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>que causou esta falha.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> that results from an attempt to cancel this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> que resulta de uma tentativa para cancelar esta instância.

trans-unit.source: exception is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: exceptioné uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes the event with the service provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o evento com o fornecedor de serviços.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that provides custom support to the class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IServiceProvider>que fornece suporte personalizado à classe.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: provider is a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the type of the service provider is a null reference (), or the proxy for the service provider is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: provideré uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic), o tipo de fornecedor de serviço é uma referência nula (), ou o proxy para o fornecedor de serviço é uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Performs initialization on dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: Efetua inicialização nas propriedades de dependência.

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.CorrelationToken%2A> property, verifies the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.InterfaceType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.EventName%2A> properties are set and verifies that the event referenced in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.EventName%2A> property can be found in the interface referenced in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.InterfaceType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método inicializa o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.CorrelationToken%2A>propriedade, verifica a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.InterfaceType%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.EventName%2A>propriedades forem definidas e verifica que o evento referenciados no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.EventName%2A>propriedade pode ser encontrada na interface de referenciado no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.InterfaceType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.InterfaceType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.EventName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.EventName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.InterfaceType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.CorrelationToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref> attributed interface type of the local service whose event is handled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"> </xref> tem o tipo de interface de serviço local, cujo evento é processado.

trans-unit.source: This property must be set before local communication can occur.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade tem de ser definida antes de comunicação local pode ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: The interface type of the local service whose event is handled.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de interface de serviço local, cujo evento é processado.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the name of the interface that was marked with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde ao nome da interface que foi marcado com o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the external event is received.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o evento externo é recebido.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Defines an event delegate that is executed after the activity receives the expected event from the local service.
trans-unit.target: Define um delegado de evento que é executado após a atividade recebe o evento esperado do serviço local.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime as part of the activity's transition to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Closed" name="Closed" href=""></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho como parte da transição da atividade para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Closed" name="Closed" href=""> </xref> estado.

trans-unit.source: This method provides the activity with an opportunity to clean up resources utilized during its execution.
trans-unit.target: Este método proporciona a atividade com uma oportunidade para limpar os recursos utilizados durante a execução.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that provides the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IServiceProvider>que fornece o serviço.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Called just after the external event is received to allow derived classes to process the inbound <xref:System.EventArgs> before the activity closes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado imediatamente depois do evento externo é recebido para permitir que as classes derivadas processar a entrada <xref:System.EventArgs>antes da atividade fecha.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The most common use of the OnInvoked method in derived classes is to extract members from the received <xref:System.EventArgs> to set the values of the derived-classed activity's public properties.
trans-unit.target: É a utilização mais comuns do método OnInvoked em classes derivadas para extrair os membros de recebida <xref:System.EventArgs>para definir os valores das propriedades públicas a atividade classificado derivada.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> that are received from the external event that was just received.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EventArgs>que são recebidos a partir do evento externo que apenas foi recebido.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameter bindings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de enlaces de parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameter bindings.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de enlaces de parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.ParameterBindings*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que visa a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.ParameterBindings*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity.ParameterBindings*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to a workflow role collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma referência a uma coleção de função de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection> limits the set of users who can send messages to a workflow instance through a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection>limita o conjunto de utilizadores que possam enviar mensagens para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho através de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection>

trans-unit.source: A collection of a workflow role.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de uma função de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the valid user roles that are allowed to send messages from the host to this activity.
trans-unit.target: Identifica as funções de utilizador válido que têm permissão para enviar mensagens do anfitrião para esta atividade.

trans-unit.source: The two types of supported roles are Active Directory and ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: Os dois tipos de funções suportadas são do Active Directory e ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> on which the activity is waiting for data to arrive.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"> </xref> no qual a atividade está a aguardar para os dados cheguem.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> on which the activity is waiting for data to arrive.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"> </xref> no qual a atividade está a aguardar para os dados cheguem.

trans-unit.source: Creates the subscription of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"></xref> activity to an event.
trans-unit.target: Cria a subscrição do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"> </xref> atividade a um evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> that represents the execution environment of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> que representa o ambiente de execução do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventHandler> for the parent event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EventHandler>para o evento de principal.</xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the subscription of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"></xref> activity to an event.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a subscrição do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"> </xref> atividade a um evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> that represents the execution environment of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> que representa o ambiente de execução da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventHandler> for the parent event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EventHandler>para o evento de principal.</xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the access type for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o tipo de acesso para a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other.
trans-unit.target: Utilizada no momento da compilação para validar se as propriedades estão vinculadas corretamente entre si.

trans-unit.source: Without this interface, this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
trans-unit.target: Sem esta interface, esta informação é inferida diretamente a partir de getter/setters de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa <xref:System.IServiceProvider>para fornecer acesso aos serviços de tempo de design se forem necessárias.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> enumeration value that denote the access level of the property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"> </xref> valor de enumeração que denota o nível de acesso da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Type> of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref:System.Type>da propriedade especificada.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other.
trans-unit.target: Utilizada no momento da compilação para validar se as propriedades estão vinculadas corretamente entre si.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa <xref:System.IServiceProvider>para fornecer acesso aos serviços de tempo de design se forem necessárias.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.
trans-unit.target: O para a propriedade cujo nome é transmitido como o propertyName parâmetro.
